WorkflowInfo.Name: Backup Cisco Configuration
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process backs up the configuration of a list of cisco routers as files.
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:StartCiscoSession;Assembly=StartCiscoSession, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:EnablePrivilegedCommands;Assembly=EnablePrivilegedCommands, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:SendCiscoCommand;Assembly=SendCiscoCommand, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ConvertToPlainText;Assembly=ConvertToPlainText, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:GetDate;Assembly=GetDate, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:WriteFile;Assembly=WriteFile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:TerminateCiscoSession;Assembly=TerminateCiscoSession, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="2" TableName="RoutersList" RowNumber="4" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="RouterIP" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="RouterName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <RouterIP>192.168.1.10</RouterIP>
 <RouterName>RouterNorth</RouterName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <RouterIP>192.168.1.11</RouterIP>
 <RouterName>RouterSouth</RouterName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <RouterIP>192.168.1.12</RouterIP>
 <RouterName>RouterWest</RouterName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <RouterIP>192.168.1.13</RouterIP>
 <RouterName>RouterEast</RouterName>
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /><ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%RoutersList%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="RoutersList" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns2:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="RouterIP" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%RoutersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="RoutersList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns4:StartCiscoSession IsValid="True" x:Name="startCiscoSession1" MaxSessionTime="00:10:00" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="%RouterIP%" SecureConnection="1" DisplayName="Start Cisco Session" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Starts Cisco Session." HostId="-2" TypeName="StartCiscoSession" UserName="" StartSession="{x:Null}" /><ns5:EnablePrivilegedCommands SessionName="startCiscoSession1" x:Name="enablePrivilegedCommands1" HostName="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:00:10" DisplayName="Enable Privileged Commands" SwitchPassword="7A546A6D794B7370626F376C5762613035626E4636413D3D" OSType="0" TimeInSeconds="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Enable cisco privileged commands" HostId="0" TypeName="EnablePrivilegedCommands" /><ns6:SendCiscoCommand SessionName="startCiscoSession1" x:Name="CiscoBackup" HostName="{x:Null}" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" DisplayName="Send Cisco Command" TheCommand="show run" OSType="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Sends cisco command." HostId="0" TypeName="SendCiscoCommand" /><ns7:ConvertToPlainText Value="%CiscoBackup%" IsValid="True" x:Name="SSHBackupTXT" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to plain text." DisplayName="Convert to Plain Text" TypeName="ConvertToPlainText" /><ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="RouterName" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%RoutersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="RoutersList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns8:GetDate IsValid="True" x:Name="getDate1" TimeInterval="Seconds" FuturePast="0" DateFormat="MM_dd_yyyy_HH_mm" TypeName="GetDate" DisplayName="Get Date" TimeZone="120" TimeZoneIDS="Israel Standard Time" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Returns the date in the specified format." TimeZoneName="(UTC+02:00) Jerusalem" TimeZoneIsInDaylightSavingTime="False" TimeToAdd="0" /><ns9:WriteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="writeFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" NewValue="%CiscoBackup%" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Write File" Path="c:\%getDate1%_%RouterName%.txt" IsAppend="False" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Write text to a file" HostId="1" TypeName="WriteFile" UserName="" /><ns10:TerminateCiscoSession SessionName="startCiscoSession1" x:Name="terminateCiscoSession1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate Cisco Session" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Terminate Cisco session." HostId="0" TypeName="TerminateCiscoSession" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
